ygData.subject: RE: decayed armor
ygData.msgSnippet: Interestingly enough I saw a post on the Paladin armor, where the Armor itself is a white except for the Gloves and Boots which are gold, so it is possible
ygData.messageBody:
Interestingly enough I saw a post on the Paladin armor, where the Armor
itself is a white except for the Gloves and Boots which are gold, so it is
possible that our new armor is a mixture of black and red (which it appears
to be). Those Vambraces do have nice stats and would be a nice piece until
Mithril or Umbral. I am curious on the color of it though, I just don't want
any red armor (I know I'm picky).

I'm curious though you have a SS of the BP are the stats what have been
rumored with the bonus given to STA (would would make like 3 different Sk
armor pieces that give a STA increase).

Enjoy..


-----Original Message-----
From: Countess Bathory D'Allatu [mailto:countess_bathory_69@...]
Sent: Friday, October 22, 1999 9:53 AM
To: shadowknight@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [shadowknight] decayed armor


From: Countess Bathory D'Allatu <countess_bathory_69@...>

From what ive seen it drops off of every Crusader now.
My dificulty, and it does seem to be me alone, is that
i cant seem to kill any Crusaders.

I have been at the Archon, simply because there are
maybe 5 spots he has a chance to spawn in as opposed
to one in UTR and AoF. Well, after 16 hours of temple
hunting, we killed 4 Crusaders. Meanwhile a friend
spent about 4 hours in UTR and got 6.

And i may add that all the parts that dropped in the
temple were pepeats or items i didnt care to get and
therefore passed them off to another SK who did want
it.

Again, this is simply my bad luck and apparently not
the situation with most.

I have yet to actually get a pair of anything *sigh*

Anyway a friend got the vambracers. Pretty good stats
for a change.

9AC
4STR

Not sure what it looked like.

But i do have a SS of the Darkforge BP and it is
indeed black.
I will upload it to my site later on and post a link
then.

Bathory D'Allatu

--- Grant Vanderhule <vandergm@...> wrote:
> decayed armor is DEFINITELY dropping more often now
> :)
>
> *runs off to MM to pick up some vambraces and a
> bracer*
>
> Beld Demonblade
> Fennin Ro
>
